/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of green and gray over the urban landscape. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the buildings, which adds a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape.
